attributes.title: I am depressed because of this app
attributes.review: Ever since I got the app I got diagnosed with depression. It makes me extremely sad that this is a real app. I am sure other people have gone through the same thing, even my grandma said it is a terrible app. This is an app the kids download and have bleached their eyes. I had to delete the app before I bleached my eyes too.

attributes.title: This was the worst thing ever
attributes.review: This app has scarred my virgin eyes!!! I opened it and i all saw was our beloved presidents NUDES!!! I have now hade 7 mental breakdowns about this and I don’t think I will ever recover. I would like president trump to pay for my therapy for the rest of my life. This is unacceptable to have a penis shown on this app especially because it was so small. I will never recover. PLEASE SAVE YOURSELF AND DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Terrible!
attributes.review: The app literally broke my entire phone 😍 and it took 78 days to download ❤️ Never getting this app again 😣😣😣🥰😍🧚 I just wanted to vote for our “amazing 😉” non racist non sexist non misogynistic non homophobic president 🥰🍊 not only that when i opened the app my entire phone turned orange then shut off 😭😭😔 I had to get a new IPhone 11 max 😻 to fix the issue 😔

attributes.title: Why is this mfking app even a thing?
attributes.review: Ok first of all..... ✨ Remove Trumpet from office✨and second of all why is this homophobic, racist, pedo orange cheto allowed to have a app? He shouldn’t be allowed to have anything luv😤😡🤬if he’s trying to removed one of our apps that actually benefits a lot of people let’s remove one of his that is gross and is on the App Store for all the wrong reasons❤️

attributes.title: Please leave this country immediately Cheeto puff
attributes.review: Nobody likes you 👁👄👁✨💅😌🧦😌☹️🤪🧦😌🧦🥱🥱🧦😌🤪😶 I had horrible nightmares when opening this app. Nightmares were about a strange orange person with a yellow toupee. I then googled the image based off description and was horrified to see the fact that the idiot is the president of my country. Get your stuff together before we come at you. - Gen Z

attributes.title: Trash goblin app
attributes.review: This app is so bad that I got a headache from looking at the color scheme and flashy lights! They send you texts all day long and sent out my number to spammers!! To make matters worse, it deleted itself before I could even take the quiz! I think my phone was hacked so I had to get a new one. This is the new one, incase you can’t tell!

attributes.title: trump
attributes.review: considering the man himself has accomplished sooo much, you’d think this app would be amazing but it’s just like him.. trash. right when I downloaded it, my phone glitched and then it overheated and burnt my skin so bad that it turned orange like the color of 45’s skin... I’m not sure if that was intentional or not but I’d prefer to keep a more natural look. I do NOT recommend this app to anyone

attributes.title: Never get this app😾
attributes.review: This app is so baddd i was the day we were going out and then when we went out here it again and we had to a good one and then they got a lot more we got to go go back and then go to our house to see if we can go back and get them back and we have to have it go go to get them and they do get

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app destroyed my phone!!! Before I downloaded it my phone ran great and had no problems but after I got it my phone began to glitch and overheat!! After two minutes of trying to run the app my phone actually exploded and now I’m writing this review from my toaster. All in all, I would rather drink lava than download this app again!!!!

attributes.title: Worst Ever
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever! I can’t even believe Apple would put this app in the App Store. You can’t even access it without giving them your phone number. Why would they need my phone number just to look at the app?? Personally invasion of privacy. Also I would give this 0 stars if it would let me.
